title: Carro Vegetariano - Mobile Trailer
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Western, Fast food, Brazilian, Take-out only
description: Traveling food car, based for most of the day on Praça José Mendes Junior, one block south of Praça da Liberdade. Then it goes to other locations - check website for location updates. Food is vegan except for the gnocchi. Expect feijoada, lasagna, veggie hot dogs and other vegan snacks. Sunday special menu.
